verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. God <WH430> standeth <WH5324> in the congregation <WH5712> of God <WH430>; He judgeth <WH8199> among <WH7130> the gods <WH430>.
How long will ye judge <WH8199> unjustly <WH5766>, And respect <WH5375> the persons <WH6440> of the wicked <WH7563>? Selah <WH5542>
Judge <WH8199> the poor <WH1800> and fatherless <WH3490>: Do justice <WH6663> to the afflicted <WH6041> and destitute <WH7326>.
Rescue <WH6403> the poor <WH1800> and needy <WH34>: Deliver <WH6403> them out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563>.
They know <WH3045> not <WH995>, neither do they understand; They walk <WH1980> to and fro in darkness <WH2825>: All the foundations <WH4144> of the earth <WH776> are shaken <WH4131>.
I said <WH559>, Ye are gods <WH430>, And all of you sons <WH1121> of the Most High <WH5945>.
Nevertheless <WH403> ye shall die <WH4191> like men <WH120>, And fall <WH5307> like one <WH259> of the princes <WH8269>.
Arise <WH6965>, O God <WH430>, judge <WH8199> the earth <WH776>; For thou shalt inherit <WH5157> all the nations <WH1471>.
